content.detailedDescription: It was about 3:00 to 3:30 in the morning i was sleeping in my van outside my place of work i got up to have a cigarette i was standing by the van when something caught my eye to my left i thought it was an owl i turned to look and to my surprise a solid black triangle  slowly moved over the roof of the building right over my head very slowly 1 mph it moved as if it was sliding across a sheet of glass the precision of movement was incredible i witnessed the event for about 5 minutes it was well lit by lights from a machine rental yard next to me it had no vents no lights no seems no rivets no windows no doors it was a black monolith i was no more than 20 feet from the craft passed over my head i look for a rock or anything i could to throw at it to get a reaction but there was nothing to throw the parking lot was clean  it moved over me then over the lot next to my work place then over the freeway no sound of any kind i am familiar with ducted fan lighter than air ion propulsion and the rest but this thing just did not fit in any of theas modes its size was 25 feet on its sides and one meter thick the edgeâ€™s tapered to a razers edge on all three sides it made a change of direction right over my head without a sound it was very impressive to see.
content.summary: Floated over me at altitude of 20 feet

content.detailedDescription: it was approximately 10:10  p.M. july 6, 2015. i let the dog out to use the bathroom and was sitting on the back porch  looking east  when a red electrical looking light similar to the aurora borealis, but circular in appearrance  appeared from out of nowhere in the sky. my first impression was that it was fireworks due to the time of year.  after about six or seven seconds the red hazy electrical glow disappeared, and bright red lights came into focus.  there were three bright red lights that  appeared to run down the length of the outer edges of the craft, which was triangular in shape.  although i could see the lights,  they appeared to be going in and out of focus. the lights started moving  slowly toward my direction. i opened the back door and was yelling for my wife to come look. my adrenaline was through the roof. as i turned back around the the craft stopped and hovered for a few seconds, and then slowly started moving in a northerly direction. as soon as it started to move north the appearance changed to a fuzzy red orb and slowly moved across the sky until it disappeared behind the tree line. as soon as it disappeared, i ran inside and turned on the tv thinking that other people would have seen it.  as of now i have not talked to or heard of anybody else seeing this sighting. i thought this to be unusual, because in my 51 years on this earth, i have never seen anything that compared to what i saw that night. i get goosebumps and my adrenaline starts to flow every time i think about it. the most disappointing thing is that i do not have any proof or film footage.  all i know for sure is that it was real, and  nobody could convince me that that craft was from this earth.
content.summary: Appeared in the eastern sky out of nowhere, it looks like a red aurora borealis. the  initial glow disappeared and there was bright red lights moving in my direction. it hoverd, then started moving north. appearrance changed to fuzzy dim red orb

content.detailedDescription: I was six years old when it first happened. we lived in a trailer approx. 12 miles from bloomington,indiana on a rural farm.I woke up and went to the bathroom. i saw green lights in my parents bedroom,i looked down hall and saw both of my parents asleep on the couch in the livingroom. i walked into their bedroom and found that i could'nt move. i became frightened and passed out. i woke up on top of a cold table. the lighting above the table was white however i looked around and the lighting in the rest of the room was green. i saw what i would now describe as a grey alien,the lighting made this alien apprear green. when this alien saw me looking at him he just looked at me and made my head feel like it was being crushed,i passed out again. when i came to i was so terrified that i played dead and witnessed them scweesing the back of my right arm. all these years i have lived with lump in my arm. over the years i've been abducted three other times. this is what i have learned, stay in densely populated areas. the last time i was abducted i was in tahoe national forest. i was camping with my brother and best friend. we were in our tent,we were talking. i said to them,look at the green lights,can you see them? neither one of them said anything. i knew they could'nt be asleep. i blacked out only to awaken back on this table again. i believe that one of these implants is some sort of tracking device. i would really like to have this device removed. i saw this ufo on our farm once, it looked translucent it reminded me of predator charactor in that arnold shwartenegger movie. i ran to get my mother,when we returned it was gone. as a child i referred to these creatures as green devils, i really did'nt have much reference material in my head as a child. my grandmother understood exactly what i was saying. she said they have'nt been around here for a while. let's not talk about them anymore.   feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Abduction,have implants in body. multiple abductions over the years. want implants removed.

content.detailedDescription: I smoke but not in my house. i routinely go out to the front porch to smoke outside. on january 1, 2012 at 2:30 am i went outside as i usually do and lit a cigarette. as i lit up i noticed a shadow cast across the ground and side of my neighbors house to the south of mine. it was a clear night with many visible stars and a lot of moon light but not a full moon. as i leaned out from my house and peered up i actually almost choked on my cigarette. i can by no means give a good description of what i saw. it would be better to describe what i couldn't see. the object was absolutely massive and completely silent but what caught my attention was that it completely blocked out the stars. it was a black object on black sky with stars out. no lights at all or visible characteristics other than the shape based on the visible stars it blocked as it passed overhead. knowing that size and scale is important, the only thing i could do was hold my forearm up and try to use it as a scale to estimate size based on estimated distance. based on a lot a vague numbers based on distance i would give a best guess size of the wingspan being around 800 feet
content.summary: Best guess is triangular with wingspan of 800 feet

content.detailedDescription: when i was young about 7years, i am now 54 years old. i was in the kitchen/dining room. i don't remember why my mother and i looked out the window.  we did not hear any noise. when we looked out the window during the day, we looked and saw a disc with flames on the outside. i could see that the disc was moving in a circle but it stayed in one place. i could see the the flames moving like a wave. it hovered for a few minutes and then it was gone. my mother and i just looked at each other; i don't remember if there where any words about this, i did not know what i felt. where i grew up is the same place where nasa and moffet field live.
content.summary: Hovering disc with flames moving and then it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I was out cross country skinning with family was by myself. family was up ahead of me. iwas kneeling down adjusting my skies looked up shaw the ufo it was right above me i lost track of time i rember it being. circle shapped red and white cololrs around the edge of the saucer in the center a bright white light like a beam was around me i was so scared i took off turned around it was gone my family said they saw nothing i have not told anyone about this till now i remember this like it was ystrdy i no i am not crazy what i saw. i have never forgotten my experience. i understand that my experience will never be herd but i firmly believe what i saw was a ufo. i have no photo only a description of what it look liked how come i can remember it after all these year's i am nervous telling my story because of what i saw
content.summary: Was at night clear sky's winter looked it was 20ft abve was stunned abt 15 min looked back down took off skinning turned around it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
We were lighting fireworks off on the 4th of july 2015 in waycross, ga. my brother, friend and daughter ere present when my daughter asked me what was in the sky. we noticed several orbs flying i believe in a ne direction and then they appeared to slow down. they changed direction and appeared to head nb. i had nothing but my i6 phone but i shot two different videos and on the first video, there are several orbs flying together and then they seem to move into more of an v shaped angle.

we thought they had left then another appeared and in the second video you can see what appears to be something jumping all around the orb.

i did not know what t was but as i watched the orbs move in unison i thought that they were probably ufo's and at that point i began to video the orbs and their movements. the orbs appeared to be circular and pulsing orange light. my daughter seems to think that the orbs changed colors to a light blue i believe.

there ere no emotions, i have seen what i think was a ufo a few years back in early october on my way to waycross so it didn't bother me. it was kind of exciting. the orbs appeared to just exit off into the sunset at a good rate but not so fast that you couldn't see them.
content.summary: Lighting off fireworks and saw orbs in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard enjoying the cold winter night when i decided to look up and saw a ufo make a trail in the sky for a duration of about one second befor both the trail and the object disappeared . there were no military jets or helicopters following it that night and no men in black or military personel the next day .
content.summary: Dark blue plasma that left a faint trail of plasma that reached 10 times the length of the object befor the object and trail vanished

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 20th i was traveling home from dinner going to the city of manassas via the prince william parkway. it had rained slightly a little but had pretty much stopped. there were some light thin clouds out but nothing heavy. the traffic was very light. as i approached the city i noticed 2 or 3 airplanes traveling from the west toward the ne probably to dulles airport some distance away. it was easy to see them as it was dusk out and the sun had almost gone down but it was not dark yet. i noticed the moon rising to my left from the tree line and also the north star above the moon popped out. as i drove on i notice a glinting motion in the sky sort of flittering back and forth from the ne toward the nw. the glinting motion was kind of broken up or seemed patchy. it wasn't real fast but fast enough to notice. it sort of looked like just more stars showing up in the sky. after 2 or 3 minutes the glinting light seemed to show more of a shape and stopped a couple times between motions. that is what really caught my attention to the point it looked very odd and out of place. i pulled over to the side of the road and stopped to see it better. it continued to move sporadically and stopped in front of the moon where i could clearly see a shape. there were no real lights that i could see on the shape but it seemed to shine on one side, almost like a reflection but i could not see anything that would shine light on it. i watched for about 5 minutes and then continued to drive but couldn't stop watching the shape as it moved around and past in front of the moon. i tried to take a few picture on my phone but it was difficult while driving so i pulled over again and watched the shape. i continued to take pictures while i was parked. i believe i was watching for total of about 20 minutes or so total. there was no sound at all but i could never really gauge how far away the object was or exactly how high in the sky. throughout my time watching the object a number of planes passed from the west moving to the ne toward dulles airport. a small plane also traveled through the area for se to nw maybe toward the manassas regional airport. it was very obvious that they were planes as i could see the lights as they approached and the sound of engines grow as they came close and subsided as they moved away. after about 20 minutes it became harder to follow the shape as it moved away from the moon and i started to lose the shape in the dark sky. after losing the shape and not seeing it for a couple minutes i continued to drive the remainder of the way home. the whole way i looked around to try to find it again but could not see it again. when i arrived home i called the non emergency phone number for the manassas police department and asked if anyone had reported strange or odd lights in the area. the woman on the phone said no she had not receive any reports but asked if i wanted a different number to call to report it and i think she said it was a mufon number. i didn't write it down as i started to feel stupid as if maybe my imagination just got carried away. i scrolled through the pictures on my phone but didn't notice anything except the moon and north stars so i thought it was just my imagination so i went to bed. the next day i could not stop thinking about it again so i looked at the pictures on my phone again and noticed in one picture i did actually get an object that is clearly not a plane, a star or the moon. the object is disc shaped moving right to left and showing the reflective light on one side. the moon is clearly below it in the picture. the object was not in the picture before or after, just this one shot. i have debated about filing a report since the day i saw the image in the picture and have finally decided to tell what i saw.
content.summary: Object over manassas city virginia- may 20 2015

content.detailedDescription: Black object that looked an antenna with a clear dome on top. it crossed the intersection of 43rd avenue and thunderbird at about 5pm. it was headed north west at about 80mph at a height of about 200 ft. there was no noise and a breeze was blowing from the direction of the object toward me, if it made anykind of noise i would have heard it.
content.summary: Black antenna with a clear dome on top

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my brother luis nunez towards mott haven projects when something in my head told me to look up. when i did look up i saw a disk shape craft flying over the projects. i said to my brother,hey did you see that? he replied, what was that? i said a ufo. so we went to his girlfriends apartment for about one hour then we left. as we walked i was looking to see if the ufo was still around. but we saw nothing. so we started to head back to my brother apartment. my brother lives on the other side of the willis avenue bridge. when we reach the middle of the willis avenue bridge again something told me to look up  when i did,there was a disk shape ufo directly above us. i then told my brother, luis look there it is right there! we could see the different color lights under the craft.Then the craft would disappear and it would reappear again.This continued for five minutes then the craft was gone. back in the 80s and living in the bronx i thought to myself, who's gonna believe us? until today that i decided to take my story to mufon.
content.summary: It was a disk shape craft with different color light

content.detailedDescription: I have seen 4 total in my life time so far. the first when i was about 8 yrs old verry low,greyish, slow two hellicopters behind. 2nd and 3rd togather the night lenix lewis fight hollifield. white dimoind shape light on bottom dom class on top. that same night private plane crashed. paper said they reported stanh object. 4th working at about 3 am seen same object cought on camera in china air port cigar shaped black row of light red on bottom green on top
content.summary: Huge no noise two helicopcter behind

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1975 several family members of mine went to the beach and when they got back home they told us (those that did not go) that a ufo had followed them back matching speed and staying on one side of the freeway or the other hundreds of feet off the ground. now the truth is we saw ufo's at least 4 times back in the 1970's and as it is now 40+/- years later, 2 of them were while being followed in a car.  now i believe it was this occasion that my dad set up  a small telescope in the top of one of our vehicles in our driveway facing north-east (mostly east) towards highgrove calif.  in fact i have that telescope with me right now:  focal 15x-45x40mm telescope with metal tripod.  this was not the first time that i had seen a ufo, prior times i remember them being glowing objects like a fluorescent bulb, i knew there was structure but my eyes could not see beyond the glow.  i went out the front door to the telescope by my self a few minutes after they had come in, around 11pm.  i could see it about an inch wide in my view thru the telescope.  it was aspirin shaped with a dome on top. i could see a metalic grey structure thru its glowing halo.  the thing that struck me the most was how thru the telescope i could see running lights moving/spinning around the bottom (right to left) but neither the true shape nor the lights were visible without the telescope.  there were at least 3 different colored lights all next to each other so they spun as a group and were square or rectangular not round.

the other time i'm writing about is our experiences at hunter park (now hunter hobby park).  located on iowa avenue between columbia avenue and marlboro avenue in riverside calif.  we'd go there to play football, frisbee, fly kites and ride the small train.  one time i clearly remember is flying a kite and spending more time paying attention to a ufo hanging out over the bad lands straight east of the park.  the bad lands run between redlands and yucaipa one one side and what is now moreno valley on the other.  this ufo was cigar shaped and was constantly doing acrobat x.  it would stay in one place where is like a cigar horizontally laying down but then would constantly flip up or flip down on one side or the other.  we were miles away and it was thousands of feet in the air so we can see it making major moves in distance as well.  for one moment it would be in 1 spot doing its acrobat x and then it would like move in a blur you knew it moved, at times a few miles and there it was again at a full stop just a second or two later doing its acrobat x.  in retrospect i believe it was watchin march afb.  march at the time was a military airlift command base with b-52's probably nuclear ready bombers at the time.  what i saw it do what we saw it do is well beyond anything i believe we can still do today.
content.summary: Several observations in southern california during the 1970's

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my condo and got up at 6:35am to use the bathroom.  looked out the window and saw a very big blood red circular object over the trees to the north west.  it had an aura and lines of red light such as an extended aura. never saw anything like it.  i thought at first it was a red moon or sun from the fires in canada but it was too big and too bright and sort of pulsing.  it did nothing, and was quiet. only hovered and glowed very brightly.  it was not a fireworks or anything like it.
i watched it for maybe 10 to 15 minutes i just kept staring at it.  eventually it did not move and i was very tired so i went to bed thinking some neighbor or other person would see it and i would find out the next day.  i got back up at 9am to a sunny day and then dressed and went outside to look at the tree area where it was hovering and there was nothing untoward.  there were some marks where fire works were shot off but they were typical.  i then looked on google and found out that on the same day the same object, same color, was spotted by people in new haven mi not far from me.
no evidence and i am now mad i was so entranced i did not take a photo.
content.summary: It was low over tree tops big blood red round object had beams or streams of red light.  too low and big to be moon or sun, plus the sun would be in the east not the west.  it  hovered.  very briight blood orange.

content.detailedDescription: First off i will start by saying that i did not see a ufo. i was contacted by some sort of advanced intelligence by saying a certain name over the phone. i was just sitting at the kitchen table of the residence i used to live and i was talking to a friend. what makes this encounter stranger is the fact that we were talking about religion, spirituality, extraterrestrials and my friend expressed to me that she thought that a worm hole could be something in a persons mind, not necessarily in space. while having this conversation the kitchen phone rings, it is another friend that is wondering if i could come pick her up from school. while talking to her i am talking in a slightly altered voice just trying to joke around. she tells me to stop joking around that she knows its me and i reply back with "no, i am lucifer". after i say this i hear a strange noise in the phone and the line disconnects. as soon as i lose the call my friend i was having the multiple topic debate with instantly shows me the new tattoo she had gotten on her neck/shoulder area. it was an upside down pisces fish that also resembled a rabbits head. instantly i thought of the movie the matrix, because of neo following the white rabbit. this event is strange to because i have been perplexed with the movie the matrix and also wondering what exactly the real matrix is and also why the world works the way it does. the following few weeks i was encountered and communicated with a being that shortly discussed the existence of the human race and in the same conversation instantly flipped the script and wondered what i was doing in its territory. it had the capability to shift to other people and speak through them, or either somehow alter what i was hearing. since the incident i have had strange side effects such as extreme pressure in my head, almost like it is radiating. crazy throbbing in my feet, almost like something is moving around or radiating in them. the strangest effect though has been with my eyes, it seems since i heard the noise in the phone it made colors more vibrant and lights way more illuminated. the entity was only around for about 2 weeks, but the physical side effects have remained. i don't know really what happened or what i was talking to, but it has really affected me psychologically because i don't know why i was contacted. it seems that it was predestined for the encounter to happen though. i say that because if that exact friend wasn't there on that exact day, when i had that exact phone call and i said that specific name, and she showed me that kind of astrological/spiritual tattoo. its just really overwhelming and i don't know why it happened to me. to be honest it has been driving me crazy and i just want some help from some like minded individuals that could possibly give me some insight on what exactly happened, or at least attempt to. the past few months have been a very frustrating and lonely time for me because this type of event is so overwhelmingly out of the ordinary. it just doesn't compute with normal everyday reality and has made it really hard for me to be normal because this event was so weird and mind boggling. i appreciate you taking the time to analyze my story and i hope to hear back from you soon, thanks!
content.summary: I said that i am lucifer while talking to someone on the phone. i heard a strange noise and was visited by some being and also physically affected.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I need to talk to kim. she has called before but my phone went dead. i have a new one at 203-715-5929
she needs to call me now. i need help with this its getting out of control...
...Urgent...Urgent...Urgent...This case is ongoing since march 13 2015.

please have her call my new cell number.!!! important
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Louvres, Wings, Other
content.summary: Having several contacts at all hours...Help!!

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of my car when my daughter noticed in the sky there was a weird object. so i looked up at the sky and saw a large bright white light attached to a smaller bright light what appeared to be a black bar attaching them. it appeared to be low  and hovering.  me and my daughter eventually left after taking pictures and video and i did not observe it leaving .  we were feeling anxious and surprised to see something like that.
content.summary: In the sky there was a large big light attached to a smaller light by a black bar

content.detailedDescription:
I was around 8 years old in 1979.  it was a weekday, sunny, warm, summer time with leaves on the trees.  i was playing with my dog tied to a tree, alone in my backyard located in the "approach zone" near bradley international airport in windsor locks, ct.  airplanes flew over my house all the time.  on weekends, typically sundays, the air national guard would do their drills, in a typical pattern.  this ufo sighing was not during the weekend.  as i left my backyard in the afternoon around 2-4 pm and crossed my driveway, above the treeline in the eastern sky i saw a classic ufo, silver, with dome on the top, and lights around the rim.  no sound came from it.  but there was some vibration which made me stop in the driveway to look up.  i made eye contact with it and stared at it for about 10-20 seconds, realizing it wasn't an airplane.  when, in my mind, i thought, "oh my god it's a ufo with aliens!"  somehow, it knew what i was thinking.  it quickly moved a few feet north and in an instant it was gone, traveling south.  i ran inside and told my mother, who of course, didn't believe me.  within minutes, the air national guard was flying over the area, not in typical formation, as they usually did on sundays.  i called my mother outside and she witnessed the fighter jets flying outside their typical drill formation.  i said, "see, i told you i saw a ufo."  the next day, in one of the local papers: either the journal inquirer or the hartford courant or the thrifty reminder, there was an article about the sightings.  it stated that others nearby at southwest park (now veteran's park) saw it too. i showed the article to my mother and she told me to never tell anyone or i would be sent to looney bin.  i found out later, that one of the park witnesses was my baby sitter.  we talked about it later and learned we saw the same ufo.  

fact - there was an article in the paper about the ufo sightings and the air national guard was patrolling the area immediately after i saw the ufo.

i saw hangar 1 episode recently about a sighting in long island and it looked just like the drawing.  i have no other evidence and would like to know if others have reported it, if you have the article or pictures of it.  

i don't remember the exact date, but it was the summer time, school was out, and i was about 7-9 years old which was between 1978-1980.  i believe it was 1979. i vaguely recall thinking the ufo sighting was the same year as the f4 tornado that ripped through bradley airport a few months later on october 3, 1979.  my brother and i stilled lived in the same house and were running home from school when the tornado struck at 2:50 p.M.  as adults we both have suffered ptsd from that experience.  

also, back in the 1990's when there was a barnes and noble on hazard avenue, in enfield ct....I was in line with my step-daughter telling her about my ufo experience and man overheard my story.  he handed me his business card.  i forgot his name and misplaced the card, but he was from mufon.  again, i never reported it because i was afraid of the stigma, but with your new show on tv....I'm so curious to know if anyone else reported it, if you have pictures of the ufo i saw, if you can locate the newspaper articles, or have airport/national guard records that prove what i saw was a real ufo.  i still live in town and the house still exists where i saw the ufo and can bring you to the exact location.

also, my friend took a picture of me on my wedding day, february 20, 2010 in tavares, fl on lake dora looking south and she took a picture of what looks like a purple orb.  but it's disk shaped and appears to be large...And moving.   the date on the camera is incorrect, it was my 75 year old friend/neighbor who took the photo so she didn't know how to change the date, so i'll attach another photo that proves it was taken on saturday, february 20, 2010, 10:55:38 am.  so the pictures were taken with two different cameras.  i was just wondering if it is a ufo and if anyone else reported seeing it.
content.summary: Mid 1970s, summer,  near bradley intl airport approach zone, saw ufo hovering over my driveway, not a plane!  during day, above trees, others saw it.  sighting was in local newspaper.  fighter jets from airport quickly arrived on scene. not a drill!

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in the early 60's.  i was at my school play ground riding my bike.  i notice that there was a bright yellow glowing object in the sky with a beam of light coming from the object.  it was so bight i thought there was 2 suns in the sky that day. i was only 8 or 9 at this time. 

i rode around the beam of  light with my bike, but something told my not to go into the light. so making several circle around the beam of light i thought best to just go.  it has been about 50 years and i still think about the encounter often.
content.summary: There was a beam of light coming for a large yellow light above me. this was as bright as the sun. i was 8 at the time of the event and could not understand why there was 2 suns in the sky that day.

content.detailedDescription: I worked height finder maintance in the usaf from 1967-1970.While i was stationed at 778 radar site in havre mt. in the evening after finishing shift checks and routine maintsnce on the height finder scopes, i was talking with airman natzel who was the heigth scope operator when natzel said look at this! he had a heigth request for a object at 85000ft. i moved to a search scope the object was moving from west to east north of the site. the search radar sweep moves at five rpm from the time i started watching the object it painted on three sweeps and had traveled approx.250 miles. the radar only covers 300 a 300 mile diaimanter. havre afs is located 40 miles north of the town of havre mt.And 4 miles south of the us and cancda border. the object was over canada. to this i do not know what i saw on radar that night .
content.summary: While working in radar maint, at 778  ac& w site i observed a object on radar north of the site at 85000 ft. moving east at around 15000 mph

content.detailedDescription:
I met with mufon's new mexico investigator paul graver on july 6th 2015 in globe arizona. the meeting lasted from 4:30 pm till 7pm. i told and showed paul everything. please contact mr. graver for all details regarding my case.

i thought i should come to your website to fill out the form and be officially on record.
content.summary: In gila river the craft appeared 5 ft above the water and 500 ft away from me

content.detailedDescription: A car load of my friends and i were driving north towards walmart in plainview, tx. we were stopped at a stop sign with walmart in view across the highway. i was in the front passenger seat. a clump of white lights first thought to be a plane rapidly came from the northwest, as it did its lights spread out to take up most of the sky in front of us. it came to a stop and hovered about 35 to 45* in the horizon. it was amazing, it seemed to have the appearance of a major downtown city on the top with countless white lights small an large. the bottom seemed circular in shape but void of most lights except the center, which had 3 white lights spaced evenly apart in its own center circle. this center circle's 3 bright lights were larger than any other lights any were else on the ship, and if you connected them with a line they would make a triangle. also the giant spacecraft's "city of lights" on top or the bottom never changed direction, only the center circle with the 3 huge white lights on the bottom center rotated.If you would have marked an arrow on this center circle on the bottom with the 3 lights at the direction in which it came from out of the northwest, when this center circle stopped after it rotated clockwise 90* this imaginary arrow would have been pointing northeast in the direction it left.When it left it left rapidly were all the lights came back together to a small cluster in the distance just like it appeared when first saw, the only differance is the small cluster of lights shot out of the atmosphere first burning bright then fading out to space just like a shooting star only in reverse. the entire time of the event; were those people in india has a red dot on there forehead, that spot in the center on my forehead twitched , this is the only time that spot on my forehead has ever twitch in a pulsating manner. my car load of friends and i were blown away with excitement, and we continued to walmart. when we arrived we exited our car and another stranger jumped out his truck yelling "did yall see that" ...We told him " heck yea that was awesome!!" i told my gov. teacher and he claimed there were multiple sightings across america at the same time were there wasn't cloud cover and was speculated to be few miles in diameter. seeing it burn out of the atmosphere like that i knew we are not alone...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Came from nw then hovered, the top (huge  city) stayed stationary, wile center rotated 90* left towards ne then burned out to space like shooting star, center of forehead throbbed during event many witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Outside of my childhood home, my mother, my son and i were observing a strange storm pattern. strange in that, the storm went around the whole town, with discolorations above the mountains surrounding the town. i started taking digital film with my camera and started snapping pictures with the same camera. i didn't see the objects until i had snapped the last picture, noticing unplaced lights in the photo. at first i thought it may have been a stray rain drop landing on the lense. there were no water markings or droplets detected on the lens and the paterns of light don't align with a rainbow effect. the objects were barely observable with my eyes after taking the picture. my mother and i talked about feeling a sense of excitement before seeing the objects. directly after taking the photo, i observed only a flash and could see the objects no longer.
content.summary: Watching a storm with my mother and son i captured a digital photo of 3 lights accending

content.detailedDescription: I had just pulled up to a spot near the summit of mt. wilson (~1/2 mile from the gates of mt. wilson observatory) to do some stargazing/astrophotography. as soon as i stepped out of my vehicle, the object caught my eye to the east. i initially thought it was a meteor, but immediately noticed it was moving much more slowly, and at a noticeably lower altitude, than any meteor i had seen. it looked to be at the same altitude as most cruising aircraft (~30,000 ft.) but traveled about 80 degrees from east to north-north east in about 5 seconds. when the sighting started, the object was about 40 degrees above the horizon, almost directly east, and i was able to follow it, as it traveled in a straight line, until it disappeared over the horizon, to the north-north east. the object appeared to have a leading edge, either a circular arc, or an obtuse rounded delta shape, with the trailing edge obscured by the trail/exhaust. the object glowed a very soft white/gray, and looked about twice the size of a 747 at 30,000 ft (which would make it about 400 ft. across at estimated altitude). the object emitted a dimmer, white/gray, patterned trail about 3 degrees long, and 1/4 degree thick, that tapered and dissipated quickly as the object traveled. the trail appeared to emanate in an alternating fashion, from the left and right side of the object in rapid succession (about every 1/6th second), leaving a trail of a corresponding, alternating pattern, during the entire sighting. i could see no red or green navigation lights common to aircraft. after the sighting i stood, somewhat in shock, staring at the spot where the object disappeared over the horizon. i looked around the sky for a few minutes, hoping to maybe see something similar, but didn't. i resumed setting up my telescopes and beginning long exposures, as the timed exposures were taking place i watched the skies. aircraft were passing overhead, in common fashion, taking about 30 to 45 seconds to cover the same perceived distance as the object seen earlier. other aircraft could be seen in the landing patterns of lax and burbank airports, all looking nothing like the object seen. satellites of different brightnesses and speeds could be seen till sunrise, all appearing nothing like the object. i observed about 15 meteors over the course of 3 hours, with the longest lasting taking less than 2 seconds to cover 90 degrees, none leaving trails like the object, or appearing so low. i've been an amateur astronomer for over 20 years, and have not seen anything similar to this before.
content.summary: Fast, gray object; left white,short , patterned trail

content.detailedDescription: Kids were out playing in front yard around 7:30pm a bright light flew towards them then the light went out revealing a gray disc shaped craft. it was only about 30 ft in the air and passed over the neighbors house no sound completely silent. then it ascended high into the sky and hovered for about an hour. it disappeared then at about 10:35pm or so came back towards the way it came same flight pattern, it had red and white lights about 6 lights i took video of it. not the greatest video, but it shows it isn't any airplane or helicopter and it moved quietly low and fast! it has been in the sky every night since thursday july 2nd, this is the first time i actually got to catch it moving  besides over the mountain.
content.summary: Almost golden white light, then red lights, gray disc

content.detailedDescription: Out of no where in my room face to face  not afraid but felt frozen for it seemed like 4 minutes.Husband i thought  was there but he does not recall ,i do.
content.summary: In my room face to face felt frozen but not afraid

content.detailedDescription:
Living in air force base housing on ramstein air base in feb 2005. my baby was asleep. my husband was working the night shift on the flight line. he was responsible for putting fuel into airplanes. i went to bed around 2am and fell asleep. i woke up in my bed at 6am and immediately recalled the following and as the morning progressed, the details formed more clearly in my memory:

i was high above the flightline in some sort of flying canoe. there were dozens of other flying canoes with 2 people and an alien in each canoe. 

we were all floating away from a gigantic mother ship. it was behind me and/or to my right. it was a saucer-shaped craft with a row of lights all around the perimeter, i don't remember if the lights were colorful or just white. 

in my canoe i was with an alien and a human man. i sensed the alien was a female because telepathically she was communicating love, comfort, and protection for me and the man. the man was in the same circumstance i was in. we both felt safe and happy.

the alien was sitting in front of me, and the man was sitting behind me. but i was turned looking to my right, so really the alien was on my left and the man was on my right. we were up in the air, i could see the tops of 1-story buildings along the flightline. it was in the middle of the night, so more than i remember seeing rooftops, i remember seeing lights on the buildings, and the bright lights of the flightline, and the lights of the mothership illuminating everything.

we were quiet, calm, content, and although i have no recollection of what happened before that moment in the canoe or how we got there or why, i do clearly remember how i felt in that moment. the man and i had just shared some sort of significant experience together, and although i have no recollection, i sense that the aliens had this man & i mate for the purpose of procreation. that was the feeling i had afterwards in the canoe, a very peaceful, meaningful feeling. 

the man was a stranger to me, but we'd shared a significant experience together, and even though i intuitively knew we'd never see each other again, it was ok because we had served our purpose and we were at peace, no need for a typical human bond. 

that's literally all i remember, a period of about 10 seconds, sitting in that "canoe," observing everything around me and feeling at peace.

next thing i remember i woke up at home in my bed at 6am. i was well-rested, unharmed, feeling fine. perhaps it was a dream? it sure didn't feel anything like a dream. i've never had any such dream in my life before or since.

when my husband came home that morning, he mentioned that on his way to the car on his way to work the night before, he noticed that anyone outside at that time was looking up into the sky. so he looked up in the sky too, and he saw a cluster or a triangle of round lights below the clouds, above the rooftops. he drove the mile or two to work, and everyone he saw was looking up in the sky. when he got to work he looked up and the lights were still there. then he had to go into work indoors. the next time he went outside he said the lights were still there. then back indoors. next time he went out, the lights were gone. he's not much of a talker, so he never mentioned if he talked to his co-workers about it too.

about a month or two later the ramstein air force base newspaper wrote an article about it. probably because so many people were talking about it and wanting an explanation. the newspaper article acknowledged that there were indeed unusual lights in the sky that february night but they passed it off as something explainable and non-newsworthy.

hmm.

i see we have the ability here to upload pictures along with our report. i'm no artist at all but this is the first time i've even thought about drawing what i saw. perhaps i'll seek an artist who can render my description better. the most remarkable aspect of what i saw were the dimensions and height from which i observed everything below. 

i discovered this mufon website a couple weeks ago. thankfully i still recall that february night 10 years ago very clearly.
content.summary: I was in a flying canoe exiting a grounded mothership.

content.detailedDescription: Observered a glowing orange  red globe at dusk just above tree line i was w my girlfriend she saw it too i turned away from it and it was gone i then observered it later that week in daylight but it was white not red my gf was scared i was curious i tried to no near it the first night we saw it
content.summary: O

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from grocery shopping .To large to miss practicely over head . knew it was an alien ship. totally still white lights 3 of them as large as car shinney aluminium didn't move  i passed a hill went back in 5 seconds was gone no sound. i was i awe  stunned but not afraid
content.summary: Traveling down private rd. near lake hoovering andstill ,white lights  aluminium avd larger than tractor trailor  hovvered until hill abstructedmy view, then gone

content.detailedDescription: Heading south toward ft randall casino hotel. my navigation unit said i would arrive at 0130 hrs. did not get there until around 0400 hrs. just north of yankten a strobe appeared outside my passenger window. i thought it was on top of a tower until it started moving with my truck. i first thought it to be perhaps some type of military driod. i spoke out loud and told it if it is friendly i would talk, if it is unfriendly to leave now. it had 2 grey bars like an upside down plug. from these a wing would extend out within the orb. the pulses were 1 per second. how i lost time i do not know. i remember putting my car into drive and driving through yankten and the orb fell behind and followed me crossing the street a few times and hovering in the trees. south of yankten the bright orb met up with a peach coloured orb about 10 feet away from it, stayed there for awhile,then they both left. the next evening i went out with some people on a hill overlooking pickstown, south of yankten and they recorded 21 orange orbs. i did not know this was going on. i was going to greenwood to do honor guard for a ceremony. the recorded orange orbs are on the star knowledge website chief golden light eagle.
content.summary: Saw strobe. looked like 3 to 4 feet about 20 feet from truck. lost about 2 hours time.
